00039 #include "string.h" // for memset
00040 #include "dataMoveDtrsm.h"

00043 // get inverse of 4x4 lower triangular matrix
00044 void inverse4x4LowerD(double * restrict src, int ld, int flagDiagisU)
00045 {
00046   double v00, v10, v20, v30;
00047   double v11, v21, v31;
00048   double v22, v32;
00049   double v33;
00050   double iv00, iv10, iv20, iv30;
00051   double iv11, iv21, iv31;
00052   double iv22, iv32;
00053   double iv33;
00054   double tempd;
00055 
00056 
00057   if(flagDiagisU)
00058   {
00059         v00 = (double) 1.0;
00060         v11 = (double) 1.0;
00061         v22 = (double) 1.0;
00062         v33 = (double) 1.0;
00063         iv00 = (double) 1.0;
00064         iv11 = (double) 1.0;
00065         iv22 = (double) 1.0;
00066         iv33 = (double) 1.0;
00067   }
00068   else
00069   {
00070         v00 = src[0];
00071         v11 = src[ld+1];
00072     v22 = src[2*ld+2];
00073     v33 = src[3*ld+3];
00074   }
00075   v10 = src[1];
00076   v20 = src[2];
00077   v30 = src[3];
00078   v21 = src[ld+2];
00079   v31 = src[ld+3];
00080   v32 = src[2*ld+3];
00081 
00082   tempd = v00*v11*v22*v33;
00083   // absorb alpha here
00084   tempd = (double) 1.0/tempd;
00085   iv00 = tempd*v11*v22*v33;
00086   iv10 = -tempd*v10*v22*v33;
00087   iv20 = tempd*(v10*v33*v21-v33*v20*v11);
00088   iv30 = tempd*(v32*v20*v11-v22*v30*v11+v10*v22*v31-v32*v21*v10);
00089   iv11 = tempd*v00*v22*v33;
00090   iv21 = -tempd*v33*v21*v00;
00091   iv31 = tempd*(v32*v21*v00-v22*v31*v00);
00092   iv22 = tempd*v00*v11*v33;
00093   iv32 = -tempd*v00*v11*v32;
00094   iv33 = tempd*v00*v11*v22;
00095 
00096   src[0]      = iv00;
00097   src[1]      = iv10;
00098   src[2]      = iv20;
00099   src[3]      = iv30;
00100   src[ld]     = 0.0f;
00101   src[ld+1]   = iv11;
00102   src[ld+2]   = iv21;
00103   src[ld+3]   = iv31;
00104   src[2*ld]   = 0.0f;
00105   src[2*ld+1] = 0.0f;
00106   src[2*ld+2] = iv22;
00107   src[2*ld+3] = iv32;
00108   src[3*ld]   = 0.0f;
00109   src[3*ld+1] = 0.0f;
00110   src[3*ld+2] = 0.0f;
00111   src[3*ld+3] = iv33;
00112 }
00113 
00114 // get inverse of 4x4 upper triangular matrix
00115 inverse4x4UpperD(double * restrict src, int ld, int flagDiagisU)
00116 {
00117   double v00, v01, v02, v03;
00118   double v11, v12, v13;
00119   double v22, v23;
00120   double v33;
00121   double iv00, iv01, iv02, iv03;
00122   double iv11, iv12, iv13;
00123   double iv22, iv23;
00124   double iv33;
00125   double tempd;
00126 
00127 
00128   if(flagDiagisU)
00129   {
00130         v00 = (double) 1.0;
00131         v11 = (double) 1.0;
00132         v22 = (double) 1.0;
00133         v33 = (double) 1.0;
00134         iv00 = (double) 1.0;
00135         iv11 = (double) 1.0;
00136         iv22 = (double) 1.0;
00137         iv33 = (double) 1.0;
00138   }
00139   else
00140   {
00141         v00 = src[0];
00142         v11 = src[ld+1];
00143     v22 = src[2*ld+2];
00144     v33 = src[3*ld+3];
00145   }
00146   v01 = src[ld];
00147   v02 = src[2*ld];
00148   v12 = src[2*ld+1];
00149   v03 = src[3*ld];
00150   v13 = src[3*ld+1];
00151   v23 = src[3*ld+2];
00152 
00153   tempd = v00*v11*v22*v33;
00154   tempd = (double) 1.0/tempd;
00155   iv00 = tempd*v11*v22*v33;
00156   iv01 = -tempd*v01*v22*v33;
00157   iv02 = tempd*(v01*v33*v12-v33*v02*v11);
00158   iv03 = tempd*(v23*v02*v11-v22*v03*v11+v01*v22*v13-v23*v12*v01);
00159   iv11 = tempd*v00*v22*v33;
00160   iv12 = -tempd*v33*v12*v00;
00161   iv13 = tempd*(v23*v12*v00-v22*v13*v00);
00162   iv22 = tempd*v00*v11*v33;
00163   iv23 = -tempd*v00*v11*v23;
00164   iv33 = tempd*v00*v11*v22;
00165 
00166   src[0]      = iv00;
00167   src[1]      = 0.0f;
00168   src[2]      = 0.0f;
00169   src[3]      = 0.0f;
00170   src[ld]     = iv01;
00171   src[ld+1]   = iv11;
00172   src[ld+2]   = 0.0f;
00173   src[ld+3]   = 0.0f;
00174   src[2*ld]   = iv02;
00175   src[2*ld+1] = iv12;
00176   src[2*ld+2] = iv22;
00177   src[2*ld+3] = 0.0f;
00178   src[3*ld]   = iv03;
00179   src[3*ld+1] = iv13;
00180   src[3*ld+2] = iv23;
00181   src[3*ld+3] = iv33;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void arrangeDataUADtrsm(double * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00185 {
00186   int cnt, diagCnt;
00187   int iValue, jValue;
00188   // zero out above diagonal
00189   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00190   {
00191           return;
00192   }
00193   else if(kLoc < 0)
00194   {
00195         iValue = 0;
00196         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00197         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00198   }
00199   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00200   {
00201         iValue = 0;
00202         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00203         diagCnt = mCnt;
00204   }
00205   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00206   {
00207         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00208         jValue = 0;
00209         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00210   }
00211   else
00212   {
00213         return;
00214   }
00215 
00216   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00217   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00218   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_D)
00219   {
00220         inverse4x4UpperD(ptrA+(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_D+iValue+cnt, MPARTITION_D, flagDiagisU);
00221   }
00222   return;
00223 }
00224 
00225 void arrangeDataLTADtrsm(double * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00226 {
00227   int cnt, diagCnt;
00228   int iValue, jValue;
00229   // zero out above diagonal
00230   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00231   {
00232           return;
00233   }
00234   else if(kLoc < 0)
00235   {
00236         iValue = 0;
00237         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00238         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00239   }
00240   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00241   {
00242         iValue = 0;
00243         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00244         diagCnt = mCnt;
00245   }
00246   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00247   {
00248         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00249         jValue = 0;
00250         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00251   }
00252   else
00253   {
00254         return;
00255   }
00256 
00257   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00258   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00259   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_D)
00260   {
00261         inverse4x4LowerD(ptrA+(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_D+jValue+cnt, KPARTITION_D, flagDiagisU);
00262   }
00263   return;
00264 }
00265 
00266 void arrangeDataLADtrsm(double * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00267 {
00268   int cnt, diagCnt;
00269   int iValue, jValue;
00270   // zero out below diagonal
00271   if(kLoc <= 0)
00272   {
00273           return;
00274   }
00275   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00276   {
00277         iValue = 0;
00278         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00279         diagCnt = kLoc;
00280   }
00281   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00282   {
00283         iValue = 0;
00284         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00285         diagCnt = mCnt;
00286   }
00287   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00288   {
00289         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00290         jValue = 0;
00291         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00292   }
00293   else
00294   {
00295         return;
00296   }
00297 
00298   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00299   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00300   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_D)
00301   {
00302         inverse4x4LowerD(ptrA+(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_D+iValue+cnt, MPARTITION_D, flagDiagisU);
00303   }
00304   return;
00305 }
00306 
00307 void arrangeDataUTADtrsm(double * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00308 {
00309   int cnt, diagCnt;
00310   int iValue, jValue;
00311   // zero out below diagonal
00312   if(kLoc <= 0)
00313   {
00314           return;
00315   }
00316   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00317   {
00318         iValue = 0;
00319         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00320         diagCnt = kLoc;
00321   }
00322   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00323   {
00324         iValue = 0;
00325         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00326         diagCnt = mCnt;
00327   }
00328   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00329   {
00330         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00331         jValue = 0;
00332         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00333   }
00334   else
00335   {
00336         return;
00337   }
00338 
00339   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00340   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00341   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_D)
00342   {
00343         inverse4x4UpperD(ptrA+(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_D+jValue+cnt, KPARTITION_D, flagDiagisU);
00344   }
00345   return;
00346 }
